0.dialouge: Far far away...~ there exists a body of water stretching far beyond the eye can see.

1.dialouge: It is said to be the origin of all life.~ Said to reach unimaginable depths.

2.dialouge: And though no one has seen it in person it is theorized to blanket over half the world.

3.dialouge: A lone kid floats on a raft~ adrift in the endless water.

4.dialouge: Untill...~ he sees a shadow over the horizon.

6.dialouge: And that's all I've got so far.

0.dialouge:
What do you mean that's it?~
You wanted to hear what I wrote didn't you.
0.speaker: Klay

1.dialouge: It's just that I thought you'd have written more by now.
1.speaker: Malo

2.dialouge:
Oh throw me a bone here Malo.~
This was your idea.
2.speaker: Klay

3.dialouge:
Oh come on!~
It's not like I forced you to do this.
3.speaker: Malo

4.dialouge: I suggested you do this to take your mind off the selection.
4.speaker: Malo

5.dialouge: You should be thanking me.~ Jeez...
5.speaker: Malo

6.dialouge: Well it was nice hanging out.~ But I should be going back to the campus.
6.speaker: Malo

0.dialouge: And you should take your leave soon as well.~ Magnis is going to be mad if you come back too late.
0.speaker: Malo
